name: run vs body
description:
In this app, you can run inside the body.

1- With different sizes (minimized up to 15 times)
2- Multiple jumping ability to reach all areas.
3- Ability to show and hide body systems ay time.
4- A free camera, then you can simulate the endoscopic medical operations in hospitals.

the female Body systems are designed according to the medical references:

-Circulatory system
-Digestive system
-Endocrine system
-Immune system and lymphatic system
-Muscular system
-Nervous system
-Renal system and
Urinary system
-Reproductive system
-Respiratory system
-Skeletal system
